entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High plus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries this afternoon. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 this afternoon. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 9 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Flurries at times heavy. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy ending near midnight then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late this evening. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Sunday 19 February 2023
